description:
修改自 Ryan 大佬的[取码器小助手](https://github.com/ryanfwy/scripting，感谢大佬的分享。
脚本使用大模型通过截图或照片来解析取餐信息，再通过【实时活动】来展示取餐码。
name: Pickup Code

localizedDescriptions.zh: 脚本使用大模型通过截图或照片来解析取餐信息，再通过【实时活动】来展示取餐码。修改自 Ryan 大佬的【[取码器小助手](https://github.com/ryanfwy/scripting/tree/master?tab=readme-ov-file#pickup-code-assistant)】，感谢大佬的分享。
localizedDescriptions.en: This script uses AI model to act as a "Pickup Code Assistant", which parses information through screenshots or photos, and then displays the code on the "Live Activities". Modified from Ryan's [Pickup Code Assistant](https://github.com/ryanfwy/scripting/tree/master?tab=readme-ov-file#pickup-code-assistant), thanks for the sharing.
